title: Manage Flotation Reagent Dosing
description: A metallurgist adjusts the dosing rate of a collector reagent in a flotation circuit to improve copper recovery.

tasks.description: Review the latest lab assay results for the feed, concentrate, and tailings streams, which show copper recovery is slightly below target.
tasks.expected_outcome: The metallurgist identifies that recovery needs to be improved.

tasks.description: Analyze the current reagent dosing rates and decide to slightly increase the collector addition.
tasks.expected_outcome: A decision is made to increase the collector dosing rate by 5%.

tasks.description: Adjust the setpoint for the collector dosing pump in the plant's control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pump's setpoint is updated, and subsequent lab results show copper recovery has increased to the target level.
